name: zhujinkui/tp5-oauth2.0-server
description: This is a class library of Oauth2.0 based on ThinkPHP5, which is a modern standard for protecting access to API.

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: ~2.8 is required to use DynamoDB storage
suggest.firebase/php-jwt: ~2.2 is required to use JWT features
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: ^1.1 is required to use MongoDB storage
